get.description:
Fetch a sorted list of jobs to which current user is assigned.

Valid values for sort direction:
- "-117" Due date
- "24"   Job step
- "198"  Job type
- "20"   Job name

Example request:
{
sort: "-117",
dir: "ASC",
offset: 0,
limit: 5
}

__Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: string of sorting direction, valid values: "ASC" for ascending order or "DESC" for descending order

get.description:
Finds out, how often a common editor configuration is used in dse types

This method will be called by MMS in order to get additional info about usage of common editor configuration by
different modules

__Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the editor configuration

200.description: the usage count of the given editor configuration in dse types

put.description:
Replace an old Editor Configuration by a new one. This Replacement must be done in all dse types, where the old
Editor Configuration is currently applied. No matter, whether the affected type variable is placed on the
datasheet or not. The changes will be add to the DSE backend Queue and will take effect next time when a "publish
changes" action is performed manually out of the dse backend

__Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

204.description:
'true' if the editor configuration was replaced successfully, otherwise 'false' if replacement not take
effect (i.e. there were no variable types with oldEditorConfigurationId)

post.description:
Change an assignee of the job at it's current step.

New assigneeID is passed as parameter, userGroupId is needed as an identifier of the userGroup. In case it's been missed the system will take userGroupId as a AREA_ID from WorkflowStepTemplate of the current Workflow Step. There is a parameter comment provided, that will appear in Job Discussion When user wants to set assignee as a group one should send an empty assigneeId field. If at the particular step has individual assignment only sending an empty assigneeId will lead to having current user as assignee __Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

post.description:
Move job forward.

This moves a job by ordinal number to the next step or finish it if the last step has been already reached. For the next workflow step assigneeID is passed as parameter There is a parameter comment provided, that will appear in Job Discussion When user wants to set assignee as a group one should send an empty assigneeId field. If at the particular step has individual assignment only sending an empty assigneeId will lead to having current user as assignee __Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

post.description:
Forward a job.

This moves a job by ordinal number to the next step or finish it if the last step has been already reached. For the next workflow step users are assigned from predefined or already existed job assignees in case when they exist in required user groups. __Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

post.description:
Move job backward.

This moves a job by ordinal number to the previous step back. For the previous workflow step assigneeID is passed as parameter There is a parameter comment provided, that will appear in Job Discussion When user wants to set assignee as a group one should send an empty assigneeId field. If at the particular step has individual assignment only sending an empty assigneeId will lead to having current user as assignee __Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto.title: JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto

id.description: The unique, internal jobtype ID of the returned jobtype.

technicalName.description:
The technical name of the returned jobtype. The technical name is generated
by the system and contains no spaces, which are replaced by an underscore,
nor special characters.

uniqueName.description:
The uniqe name of the returned jobtype. The technical name is initially
generated by the system and contains no spaces, which are replaced by an
underscore, nor special characters. It is possible that the unique name gets
changed.

displayName.description:
The display name of the returned jobtype. The display name is used for UI
labels of the jobtypes and can be stored multilingual. This name is
changeable and not unique.

description.description: The description of the returned jobtype. The description is used for UI.

JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto.description: DTO for job type with workflows.

ProductSearchParamDto.title: ProductSearchParamDto
ProductSearchParamDto.description:
Generic search configuration

there are 2 cases with instance/locale ids :
1st case: instanceIds or/and l10LocaleIds are specified.
These criteria applied as OR and max results will be number of instanceIds * number of l10nLocaleIds.
2nd case: Equal number of instanceIds and l10nLocalePreferedIds are specified.
These criteria applied as pairs of instanceId and l10nLocaleId. Max results will be number of pairs.
